name: Mushroots (Ducklings Studio)
description:
Would you like to play mushrooms? It's time to try! In Mushroots you can build, evolve, attack and... EXPLODE. And all in order to protect your mycelium and grow as much as possible. 

Q,W,E,R - to use an ability 

LMB - to select a mushroom 

RMB - to cancel selected 

SPACE and move MOUSE - to look around 

SCROLL - to resize the map
